descriptionHtml:
I like Vikings,2H weapons,berserkers and absolutely Skyrim so i made him.Actually i have a potato (ex:2.6ghz 2gb ram) but somehow i play Skyrim with +100 mods without problem lol whatever this is my first work and forgive me  if i made a mistake on description or contents...And of course my terrible language.Have fun!

Required Mods (Download and install them in this order)
Tools:
SKSE: http://skse.silverlock.org/
SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?
RaceMenu Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?
ApachiiSkyHair http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended Mods:
Textures:
I'm using ursi's Smooth Male Body http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?
Eyes:
The Eyes Of Beauty: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?

Armor:
Letho's Pants http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Instructions:
After downloading and installing all mods mentioned above.
Follow these steps:
1. Download my mod and install it at data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Nord Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Press F9 and done
author: RolloTheBerserker
